mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ORDER_NO, USER_NO, PAY_NO, ORDER_NAME, TOTAL_PRICE, ORDER_COMMENT, ORDER_RECEIVER, ORDER_ADDRESS, ORDER_TEL, ORDER_FEE) VALUES ((select nvl(max(order_no), 0) + 1 from orders), 1, (select nvl(max(pay_no), 0) + 1 from orders), #{order_name}, #{total_price}, #{order_comment}, #{order_receiver}, #{order_address}, #{order_tel}, #{order_fee})
